headline.main: Scores of Students Take Up Acupuncture at Center in Syosset

keywords.value: NEW CENTER FOR WHOLISTIC HEALTH EDUCATION AND RESEARCH
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: IN a classroom on a Saturday morning a man lay on a table with his shirt open and about 12 needles protruding from the face and chest. A second young man leaned over and carefully inserted an additional needle through a plastic tube into the chest while their teacher watched. "The angle is not quite right," the teacher, Dr. Chi Chou, said. "It should be pointed outward, in the direction of the meridian."
